verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--nija-saṅgī kāṅho nā la-iba
eka-jane nile, ānera mane duḥkha ha-iba

synonyms: prabhu kahe—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu replied; nija-saṅgī—of My associates; kāṅho—anyone; nā—not; la-iba—I shall take; eka-jane nile—if I take someone; ānera mane—in the mind of others; duḥkha ha-iba—there will be unhappiness.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said,"I shall not take any of My associates with Me because if I choose someone, all the others will be unhappy.
